DOC.brief_summary: Phase : Phase III Indication : Erectile Dysfunction Study Design : open-label , fix dose , 6-month extension study ( parent study : DA8159_EDD_III )
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Once-a-Day Dosing Udenafil Treat Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: Completer parent study ( DA8159_EDD_III ) continue 24weeks open-label extension receive udenafil daily . The study conclude 4-week ED treatment-free period .
DOC.criteria: Male patient age 20 year diagnose erectile dysfunction ( ED ) Had uncontrolled blood pressure Had hepatic renal dysfunction Had significant psychiatric disorder drug abuse Was currently anticancer chemotherapy Had treatment ED use phosphodiesterase type 5 ( PDE5 ) inhibitor
